artist: Painter: After Giulio Romano; Delineator: Antoine Borel; Engraver: Jean Baptiste Pattas
description: Jupiter lying on a woven basket on a sheet, sleeping; three women with pitchers beside him; two groups of people, one left and one right in background; all beside water in a landscape
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Peint par Jules Romain   Desiné par Borel   Gravé par Patas / L\'ENFANCE DE JUPITER / De la Galerie de S.A.S. Monseigneur le Duc d\'Orléans / A.P.D.R.  | on sheet in pencil: 2-311
title: The Childhood of Jupiter
